website_summaries.verdict: Offers instant gratification after applying. Sprinkle on and voila! – the appearance of a thicker, fuller mane.
pros: Instantly conceals thinning hair and bald spots
Non-greasy and blends well with own hair as long as there is some hair on scalp
Looks and feels like real hair after working into strands
cons: Better for smaller thinning patches vs. larger areas
Fibers could clump, making it obvious the hair is fake

customer_reviews.title: Wowzers
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not too thrilled that make package was delivered late, the product is absolutely amazing. The fibers blended perfectly, and stayed put well over to the next day -- even after sleeping with a night cap (shown in the fourth picture) While the bottle doesn't update you on how much you have left to use, and although it can be a bit tricky actually seeing how much you really ARE using (particularly when application is needed towards the back of the head), it's definitely worth the 20 bucks. I've only had the bottle for two days, and I don't think I've used much at all; I'll see how far it takes me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not too happy buying these nasty stuff
customer_reviews.text: Hair Fiber..I am not too happy buying these nasty stuff..guys do not go by these reviews above..these people are a scam I think..I would never use this product again on my head. This stuff is totally visible and looks horrible. I would rather use paint on my head than the hair fiber. So guys don’t waist your money on these fibers that are not what they are saying on these reviews. Good luck if your thinking about buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Quais Uddin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. I am actually impressed with the results. Unfortunately, the packaging is not up to par with its contents. During the first use, the lid slid off the bottle and the majority of the fibers poured out every where. What a disaster!! I was able to get a few uses after that.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Works well; works better for patches not overall thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I have a thinning hair part on the top of my head as well as overall crown thinning. While I thought this product worked to help hide it a little, it did not completely eliminate the noticeable scalp line like shown in some of the pictures, at least not for me. This product would would probably be better for people with small balding spots versus large areas to cover; I think that with overall thin hair too much of the product makes it look like you have dirt on your head. That being said, it is better than nothing but you can also use eyeshadow close to your hair color for the same effect at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a novice user of hair fibers. When my hair was red, I was using a different product, but they don't make gray. I decided to give this a chance, and it's fantastic. It blends well with my salt/pepper hair, and I now use it daily. I'll be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Craft

customer_reviews.title: Fibers Are Not as Thick As I'd Like
customer_reviews.text: I previously used a different product so had experience with this type of item. I found I needed to use a lot of the product to cover my thinning spots. But it doesn't rub off easily and lasts once you get enough to cover. The color was perfect but other brands have thicker fiber that need much less to cover. The shipping was very quick and customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Wikyjalo

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm using this wrong, but it doesn't seem to help hide my receding hairline. Maybe it's good for folks with a bald spot on the back of their head, but it doesn't seem to do anything for my receding hairline in the front. Sad I was hoping this would help as I don't seem to be losing more hair after starting Propecia but I'd like my hair to look more full in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product unsure of if it would actually work like it states it does. I am very pleased to say that it exceeded my expectations. I had to wear my hair pulled back all the time due to trouble spots. Since purchasing this product, I found the courage to cut my hair to a much shorter style and I am not as self conscious about the areas of concern. I will continue to use this and purchase it again. It has been a life saver. The follow up by the seller was impressive. The contact initiated to make sure that I was happy all the way around speaks volumes to the customer support this company provides.
customer_reviews.author: jil pels

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !! Total works !! Total worth it !!
customer_reviews.text: Was very afraid of trying this figure it would be a waste of money. But at 29 year old I was thining a lot on the back of my head I was willing to try it ! And I have to say it was easy to apply and the results speak for them self !!! I will be buying more for sure !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything about their other colors, but the red is horrible. What person with red hair has a bright red part in their hair? That what it does, colors the scalp and barely the hair. Also within 1 day, clean just washed hair is greasy looking, as these fibers are being combed through your style. It's a no for me on future purchases. I'll stick with hair thickness maximize brand.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Really helped a lot.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great on me. For whatever reason, probably mostly age unfortunately, my hair has been thinning. I've tried many shampoos to encourage growth, but so far haven't had much luck. So I went to a powder such as this to cover the sparse spots. I actually bought 2 different products. The other one says to liberally put it on and this one says "less is better" and to use a little at a time. I find this covers great with just a small amount, and the color (in my case light brown) matches perfectly. And it lasts until you shampoo it out. I have been very pleased with this product in that a container will last for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS A MIRACLE WORKER!!
customer_reviews.text: I RARELY review anything but I must say that this stuff is a MUST HAVE for any ladies concerned with menopausal (or any time) hair thinning!! I simply cannot believe there is NO transfer onto my fingertips when I powder my thinning areas and then blend in. Additionally, the fibers match my auburn hair perfectly. Do not hesitate to buy this product! I will never be without this gem again 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light Brown ....I don't think so
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my school aged son who has been struggling with Trichomania or hair pulling. He has light brown fine hair this product is so hard I would call it more of a mahogany or mocha color. I tried it once anyway was awful the color is so bad don't waste your money or research the colors more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennightnurse

customer_reviews.title: Cured my depressive state
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has definitely cured my depression. I had a huge bald spot and this covered it like hair. It’s better than the black crayon pen that looks unrealistic. I will never go without this product again. I’m so freaken excited. I’m a 29 year old female. Imagine having a bald spot in the front of ur hair? I’m so happy for this I could cry. Thank you stranders. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Anjelly

customer_reviews.title: These products work great for covering thin areas or your part
customer_reviews.text: These products work great for covering thin areas or your part. I am not sure how well they would work for actually covering a bald patch. I have been VERY happy with it for my purposes. No need to buy Toppix or spend more.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: I am Happy to say...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive product. I have used several professional and store bought powder type thickeners and also powder color fillers. Your Strand holds up to its promise to cover and it thickens my very fine hair. Sadly stress, time, lots of styling and coloring has taken its toll.. So I am happy to say your product is a great solution for men and women of thinning hair or even a color touch up, with out the expensive hair replacement, I am sure a lot of people can not afford. Thank You for an honest product.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It is very fine powder. I have gotten several friends to start ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. People are always raving about my hair. I use a soft makeup brush to remove stray powder from my brow. When the powder stops coming out, I tap the side of the bottle on the edge of the sink. That loosens it up. It is very fine powder. I have gotten several friends to start using it, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for thinning hair, not so good for completely bald areas
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift, they loved it although I would say it works better on thinning spots rather than fully bald areas. The recipient kept forgetting and touching the fully bald area in which it would easily rub off.
customer_reviews.author: GottohaveTech

customer_reviews.title: "Light brown" aka red as hell and really dark Useless color palate
customer_reviews.text: "Light brown" aka red as hell and really dark Useless color palate. Everything is red tinted. Where are all these redheads? I don't see the demand myself. Just stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Xenophon's loser brother

customer_reviews.title: Quick fix
customer_reviews.text: True to description. Hair looks fuller. Does not irritate skin, does not shed. Easy to wash. However, if you hair is merely fine and there is no seriously wide gaps to cover, the powder is difficult to apply just to the narrow partitions - it sprinkles around in sort of messy clots that you need to comb out. I guess my hair is not thin enough for this. But I would definitely recomment it to those who have bald spots. It works perfectly when applied as close as possible to the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: HaHa, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly vain, sorry to say that. But this product is something I simply love. It covers completely and is undetectable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. West

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought this was a long shot. I bought this for my husband who is going bold. He has thinning hair in some spots. This worked perfect for him. I found other products way more expensive and honestly I don't see how can get more real-looking than this. Perfect for a photoshoot we have that he was getting a little worried about. I couldn't even tell standing really close. Make sure you pick the right color, and apply it little by little very patiently. This product most likely wont work on bold people thats a different problem and it's very clear on the description. Read so you don't end up disappointed!.
customer_reviews.author: B Barron

customer_reviews.title: I had a different brand before but now this is my favorite. I've tried it in 2 different colors and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these type of products for a few years now. I had a different brand before but now this is my favorite. I've tried it in 2 different colors and they are a very good match. The fibers are fine yet they stay in place for more than 24hrs and look very natural. I use hair spray just to be sure but it's not needed. This is my 2nd purchase from this seller and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DecemberRN

customer_reviews.title: Great for thinning hair!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a young woman suffering from hairloss. My hair is thinning in the back and I have a bald spot forming. These hair fibers work great - I apply some on the thinning areas and with the right part my thinning hairs/bald spot are no longer visible! I use to be so self-conscious but with the hair fibers in I feel confident again! I haven't had any problems with the fibers coming off and they shampoo out easily. I definitely recommend this to anyone with thinning hair - it is an instant solution!
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: It does cover my thin spots pretty well. My scalp is very oily so it ...
customer_reviews.text: It does cover my thin spots pretty well. My scalp is very oily so it gets a bit flaky after 8 hours or so. I used a facial brush to even it out the next morning and touched up the spot and it looked brand new again. Worked well with dry shampoo too.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Diem

customer_reviews.title: I also had a hard time getting it on so that it would look "natural" and not like I had powder on my scalp
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning the product as it made my scalp very itchy. I'm probably sensitive to whatever is in it. I also had a hard time getting it on so that it would look "natural" and not like I had powder on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zesati

customer_reviews.title: Good product for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: Due to illness and surgeries my hair has become very thin. Since I have been using this product my hair looks so much thicker and fuller. My friends cannot believe that it is my hair and not extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My grandson has bald spots and he sprinkles some of the Strand Maximizer on his hair and combs it through and it does a fantastic of hiding the bald spots. I am very satisfied and will purchase it again. ....Just a little side note.... It works best if you put it on when your hair is dry rather than when it is wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light brown matches better than the dark brown
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy anything else. The light brown matches better than the dark brown. I'm soooooo happy I got the applicator this time. It applies the powder exactly where you want it to be delivered. No hassle, no mess. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CDP

customer_reviews.title: Covers the bald spots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product along with it's applicator. The product goes on great and seems to stay in place perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: happygolucky

customer_reviews.title: It covers the gray, but of you touch your ...
customer_reviews.text: It covers the gray,but of you touch your hair it will get all on your hands or anything you put your head on.you have to cover your hair before bed or it will get all the pillows and bed sheets .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Samuel

customer_reviews.title: The coverage of this product is very good. But it just doesn’t stay very long
customer_reviews.text: The coverage of this product is very good. But it just doesn’t stay very long. I bought a spray to assist with how long it stays on so I can get a good 8hrs with no issues as long as I remember to keep my hands out of my head lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I’m skeptical, but my barber recommended it so I gave it a shot. I’m honestly blown away by how good it works. I don’t know how it looks in all lighting situations, but it definitely works for me. You need to make sure your hair and scalp are completely dry before adding the product or it’ll look clumpy. I didn’t have much luck on the front of my hairline, but on the crown it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, it's terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. I've been using Toppik for years and thought I'd try this based on reviews. It's definitely nowhere as good. It clumped up and ended up all over my bathroom. Even after using a setting spray. The clumps looked like lint you'd pull off your clothes. And I can't return it because this item isn't eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Great for covering those thinning areas
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Great for filling in the thinning areas and it looks natural. I have dark brown/ black hair and the black fibers seem to cover it just fine !
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Use every day!
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty good job of camouflaging hair loss. I just sprinkle on my part and it fills it in. Lasts a good while; usually don't have to reapply. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: SammyRose

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So i my self was very skeptical about this product, but decided to give it a shot anyway. I am not a paid customer or actor whatever y’all may be thinking, I’m a regular guy with thinning hair and although this doesn’t regrow your hair it actually does what it’s suppose to do and I’m really happy. I have regained a lost part of my self I haven’t seen in 2 years. Don’t hesitate and stop over thinking just buy it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit unsure about this product when ordering but I have to say, it helps so much and it really is not noticeable. I went over to my daughter's and she said, 'something is different but I don't know what.' she was shocked when I told her. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Stecker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My hairs been thinning in the front for the past few years. This is exactly what I needed. I do sweat a lot and this stuff does not come out. No one can tell either. The color was spot on so it was a perfect match. This gave me so much confidence back and I’m very happy I came across this.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy P

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I tried it and love it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about trying it out as I've never colored my hair before. it's perfect for concealing my bald areas and looks so natural. it gives me confidence in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the trouble and potential mess. My hair line is thinning, and I just use colors dry shampoo, easy to use, no mess, and it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieDavis

customer_reviews.title: very messy.. my gf complains it gets everywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: very messy.. my gf complains it gets everywhere after i have it on. im forbid to put this stuff on my head again at the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a budget friendly price
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly inexpensive which is why I purchased it over others. It is more of a powder than fibers, but does an adequate job. Even without hair loss you are going to see some scalp, and you will with this. It just makes it less conspicuous and that is all I am asking for. It is also possible that I just need to go to a darker shade and may try that once I've used this up. Good product at a budget friendly price.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Barra

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work for me unfortunately and the dark blonde was red so even the dust coverage that I did get were off
customer_reviews.author: jishs37

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: On what planet is light brown hair equal to red hair? My hair is a true light brown/dark blond, so I ordered light brown and the color is a deep red/maroon color.. no where near the color brown. Also, make sure you have some length to your hair, otherwise it just looks like makeup on your scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and it looks good once sprinkled on the hair but it was such a mess. I think it is because the fiber is too fine. It flies everywhere and I ended up with fibers all over my hands and even on my face but once you sprinkle on the area it stays in place and it looked very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried quite a few of these types of products and nothing compares to this one. It is an excellent product! It totally fills in the thinning sections of my hair and no one would ever know there was product in your hair. Very easy to use and is an excellent price. Most of these products are $36.99 and up and aren't as half as good as this one. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: More affordable
customer_reviews.text: More affordable to refill than other brands. Worth the buy and refills.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: instant hair!!
customer_reviews.text: this product works excellent for anyone that has thinning hair it fills in nicely and is offered at a great price 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: darrin durrell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. When I first used it, it came out unevenly so I rubbed my fingers to disburse the fibers. It worked out better that way. Doesn’t make me itch even rubbing it on.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on my boyfriend because he has been self-conscious about his hair thinning out/getting bald spots. This worked great! It definitely did the job, his hair looks much thicker and fuller now. And it’s easy enough to use that he can apply it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Casey G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s like magic
customer_reviews.text: I have trichotillomania and my hair is thin everywhere. With my black hair you can see my scalp pretty easily so I’ve been putting black eyeshadow on my scalp for awhile and it takes FOREVER it makes me dread washing my hair. This stuff is awesome I just shook some on my bad areas and poof it’s covered in 2 seconds. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Prism

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thinning hair concealer I have ever used. The coloring was easy for me b/c I have black hair, but I've been using concealers for years due to a thinning area on the crown of my head. It is completely undetectable even in sunlight that I am missing any hair. The price is very reasonable and I am now switching to Strand Maximizer. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: jessieinsanfrancisco

customer_reviews.title: I think that if my hair is short in front then this stuff fills in better. Right now my bangs are kind of long ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I need to take this to my hair salon the next time I go. I think that if my hair is short in front then this stuff fills in better. Right now my bangs are kind of long so it doesn't really fill in. Maybe I just need to practice a little more and try different things.
customer_reviews.author: Country

customer_reviews.title: Omg.  It works like magic..
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have a really big bald spot due to stress right in the middle of my head.. This stuff makes me feel like i have hair again.. Ill buy it agian for sure..
customer_reviews.author: VD

customer_reviews.title: Great for thinning hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for thinning hair. As a female, I appreciate the coverage of my scalp in areas of my head where hair is less dense. It makes my hair look more full and hides the scalp in thinning areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Lamphere

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for this product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even see the spot with this in your hair it’s as if it was never their
customer_reviews.author: brock

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly like the other hair fiber products but at a much better price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: My wife is very conscientious about her thin hair. ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very conscientious about her thin hair. She bought this for our daughter's wedding since flash photos tend to show how thin her hair really is. This product worked perfectly. You couldn't tell she had used anything but her photos came out very well.
customer_reviews.author: hamsterwmca

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have big expectations when I ordered this product but I am so happy with it and am going to go ahead and buy another one just to have. It's been a miracle the transformation of my hair using this. I truly see the difference and I actually like fixing my hair now. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Medium brown = purple red
customer_reviews.text: While these fibers actually hold on well, the color is dreadful. Medium brown has a purplish, red tone that seems like it would be right at home on a bad old lady dye job.... It's really red and in daylight looks ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed on how well it works
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed on how well it works. It boosted my confidence by knowing and seeing that I no longer have the light spots in the front.
customer_reviews.author: PD300

customer_reviews.title: This product is absolutely amazing! I experienced some thinning around my edges after ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing! I experienced some thinning around my edges after child birth and I needed something to help me out until my hair thickened back up. This product got the job done for me and gave me the confidence I needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This product was a good match for my haircolor & did provide coverage-however-it tends to clump as the day goes on. There are other root touch up/coverage products that I prefer over this.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Kokinda

customer_reviews.title: If he uses to much it looks unnatural like he dyed his hair so a little goes a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product. His hair is black with about 15% gray mixed in. Just a little makes a major differents. It blends into the grey on top and it fills in the thinning sections. If he uses to much it looks unnatural like he dyed his hair so a little goes a long way. I have never noticed any flaking on his shirts or his face. It has taken 10 years off of his looks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. King

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This powder works very well on covering bald spots! So happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Zeb Books

customer_reviews.title: The product is great. I would give it 5 stars but the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. I would give it 5 stars but the first bottle I used the lid came off and the powder went everywhere. Huge mess. Luckily I had ordered a second bottle and was able to use the product. It works great and will definitely order again. Just hold on to the shaker lid!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: There was barely any powder in there. My last one was full and lasted a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: kati

customer_reviews.title: So upset
customer_reviews.text: I went to use it for the first time and the top fell out and had the fibers EVERYWHERE... my entire bathroom is covered and i am out almost 20 bucks because it isnt elible for return... Very upset! What a waste. Double check the cap before you use this if you order it. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: I am a 55 woman with thinning, somewhat curly ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a 55 woman with thinning, somewhat curly brown hair. this is my second container of this brand. Similar to other brands, it does inconspicuously help camouflage the thin spots . Just don't expect miracles!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been thinning for years, and its been embarrassing to say the least. Now I feel like I can leave the ball cap at home and have some confidence. Great product and great price
customer_reviews.author: Mickey C

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Well you get older and you start losing your hair. I got this product to cover my bald spot and it works great. I sprinkle a little on and it covers it so well. Looks like hair. I like it a lot. I'll probably will buying more when I need to. I would recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked better.
customer_reviews.text: The product price was great but the product itself was not. We have used the pricer brand before without issue but this brand wasn’t made as well. The fibers are clumped together with is very noticeable. This causes it to not blend as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Seymour

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my young son who had a temporary bald spot on the top of his head. Overall, it covers well. My son is very active and in a lot of sports. The first few times he used it, it came off by the end of the day. There were a few times when it stuck together and made it look worse. Our solution was to put a thin film of hair gel on the spot ahead of time and told him not to touch it during the day - then, it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It covers just what I needed covered
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It covers just what I needed covered. I lost my hair to cancer, after my hair stared growing back, that is when I used ir and will continue to use it. I keep my hair short anyway, and it works super.
customer_reviews.author: Choo

customer_reviews.title: I would like to order the correct color
customer_reviews.text: The web page did not give me option for color. So I got two items that are too dark for me. I have no way of returning them without an order form. I would like to order the correct color.
customer_reviews.author: snave

customer_reviews.title: Use this everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t trip chocolate chip, this works perfect!! Probably won’t run out for months even if you use it everyday like I do.
customer_reviews.author: RomeoRivera2C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hides the bold spots well, but It hard to apply to your own head alone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing at concealing balding areas. I don’t recommend using the shaker and instead using a small/medium makeup brush dipped in the powder and tap it directly over the area for more even coverage. It has changed my confidence completely. Love how natural it looks.

customer_reviews.title: Have PCOS, and I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've have bought this twice now, and it's been my life saver. It lasted me 3 months and I would use it about 3 times a week for second day hair, or any time I had noticeable thin spots with my style for the day. It's easy to apply, and yes it can get messy (on the counter) but it's easy to clean up with a wet towel. So glad I found this stuff. *I'll update with pictures*

product_meta.title: Hair Fibers Conceal Hair Loss, Thinning Hair and Bald Spots on Men & Women with Black Hair
feature_bullets: WORKS FOR BOTH MEN & WOMEN: 1000's of people have regained their confidence lost due to thinning hair. See why so many people rely on Strand Maximizer every day to conceal their thin hair.
EASY APPLICATION: Sprinkle Strand Maximizer on to thinning areas for instant coverage, lasts all day and when done simply wash out with any shampoo!
INSTANT THICKER FULLER LOOKING HAIR: Hair building fibers help cover up thinning hair or cover bald spots for both women and men.
KERATIN HAIR FIBERS: Our hair powder is made of structural proteins which are charged with static electricity to intertwine and bond with your own hair follicles.

NO QUESTIONS ASKED, 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: As Always Strand Maximizer comes with our customer satisfaction 100% GUARANTEE! No Questions to asked, 100% Money Back Guarantee When You Purchase Today!
